description: Keep all forcings the same as C4MIP esm-ssp585 scenario, but replace land use with ScenarioMIP SSP1-2.6  (aforestation) scenario. Emission driven.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP5-8.5 forcing and SSP1-2.6 land use
long_name: emissions-driven SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use
rationale: Land-use policy sensitivity simulation for high radiative forcing scenario.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing excluding land use.
Emissions driven.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, excluding land use
requirements.label: RCP85 Forcing Excluding Land Use

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP2.6 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6, Land Use
requirements.label: RCP26 Land Use

requirements.description: Use a fully coupled Earth system model
requirements.label: ESM Configuration

requirements.description: All applicable land management active in the model configuration.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, all land management, Grassland, Fire, Wood Harvest, Pasture, Crop, Irrigation, Fertilisation
requirements.label: All Land Management Active
